segments.text: Ugh, just look at this kitchen, it's a total mess in the making.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just gushing over the sink's edge, creating a nasty puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's soaking the cabinets and the floor, surely causing damage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That woman is standing right in it, and she has no clue!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can you be so unaware of a small flood happening around your feet?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children's activities just add to the potential disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If that stool tips, there'll be broken dishes and even more water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost feel the slippery, grimy water under my feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast with the pristine garden outside is just jarring.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene is really bothering me with its impending sloppiness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to turn off that faucet immediately.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of cleaning all this up is already giving me a headache.
segments.speaker: PAR
